capstone.ui

Class ThemeCreationWidget

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.googlecode.lanterna.gui.Window
      • capstone.ui.Widget
        • capstone.ui.ThemeCreationWidget
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.googlecode.lanterna.gui.Component

    public class ThemeCreationWidget
extends Widget
    A Widget to manage creation of a new Theme. This "Theme Creation" Window shows an InputWidget for a name along with buttons to open RepresentationWidgets for each of the Kinds, such that every Kind gets a Representation in the Theme.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface com.googlecode.lanterna.gui.Component

    • Method Detail

      • theme

        public Theme theme()
        First validates the entries for the various Kinds. If the input is valid for all RepresentationWidgets and the InputWidget for the Theme's name, a valid Theme is returned, else null.
        Returns:
        Returns a valid Theme, if possible.

      • validate

        public boolean validate()
        Validates the NameWidget and the RepresentationWidgets for all the Kinds.
        Returns:
        True if the Theme is valid, else false.

      • _showMessageBox

        private void _showMessageBox(RepresentationWidget widget)
        Shows a message box that some input was invalid in the given Widget.
        Parameters:
        widget - The RepresentationWidget that was invalid.

      • _createNameEntry

        private void _createNameEntry()
        Creates the InputWidget for the name of the Theme.

      • _addEntry

        private void _addEntry(Element.Kind kind)
        Adds a new button to the ThemeCreationWidget, which, when clicked, opens a RepresentationWidget for the Kind.
        Parameters:
        kind - The Kind of Element to add an Entry for.

      • _createRepresentationWidget

        RepresentationWidget _createRepresentationWidget(Element.Kind kind)
        Creates anew RepresentationWidget for a given Kind.
        Parameters:
        kind - The Kind to create the RepresentationWidget for.
        Returns:
        The resulting RepresentationWidget.

      • _makeTheme

        private Theme _makeTheme()
        Creates the Theme from the input-widgets and stores it to disk.
        Returns:
        The Theme created from the Representations extracted from the various RepresentationWidgets.

      • _createBottomButtons

        private void _createBottomButtons()
        Adds the buttons at the bottom of the Widget. Those buttons are DONE, CANCEL and EXIT. DONE only closes the window if the input is validated.
